TextView.android:text: A panel discussion on the theme 'Where men are truly confident, women are valued' which would look into the changing dynamics of Man-woman relationships in the 21st century India. The panel discussion would look into:
* Rising crimes against women and the aspirational gap between men and women
* Need to open up channels of communication with young men
* Role of media in projecting an alternate image of men who are comfortable and confident enough to allow women their space in their world
* Role of students organizations and campaigns to address the issue of gender based violence
